segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and it’s making me so frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching for the cookies, and the stool is so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is just as bad for encouraging him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading everywhere, and it’s going to cause so much damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever realize what’s going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside is a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to warn her, but I don’t know how.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so close to falling, and the woman is still unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is making me feel so helpless.
segments.speaker: PAR
